model_settings.note: Agent A uses macro persona, Agent B uses tech persona. See personas in execution_loop.py

experiment_metadata.execution_order: Cycles run sequentially. Each cycle: (1) pair_designer selects node pair, (2) agents generate edges, (3) CSER measured, (4) KG updated.
experiment_metadata.kg_construction: Nodes created by agents (록이=macro, cokac=tech) during collaborative problem-solving. Tags assigned by creating agent. Relations: references, extends, contradicts, grounds.
reproduction_steps: 2. Run metrics.py to compute CSER, DCI, edge_span_norm, node_age_div
